parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of the center of mass

parameters.name: CoordinateSystemName
parameters.description: Name of the coordinate system in which the center of mass is defined

title: IMassPropertyOverrideOptions.SetOverrideCenterOfMassValue
description: Overrides the calculated center of mass of the model currently being edited.
signature:
System.Boolean SetOverrideCenterOfMassValue( 
   System.Object
Value
,
   System.String
CoordinateSystemName
)

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of the center of mass

parameters.name: CoordinateSystemName
parameters.description: Name of the coordinate system in which the center of mass is defined

returns: True if the center of mass is successfully overridden, false if not
remarks:
This method is valid only if
IMassPropertyOverrideOptions::OverrideCenterOfMass
is set to true.
